alert.note: Alert for Benton; Kanabec; Mille Lacs; Morrison (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 29 at 11:03PM CDT until March 31 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THURSDAY TO 7 AM CDT FRIDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, freezing rain Thursday night with ice accumulations up to a tenth of an inch. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches possible along with blowing and drifting snow. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Morrison, Mille Lacs, Kanabec and Benton Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 7 PM Thursday to 7 AM CDT Friday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Friday evening through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
